*[[Time Flute#Shops|Undella Town Gem Master]] }} == Description == The '''Time Flute''' is a type of [[Flutes|Flute]]. By using Grass, Psychic, and Water Gems the Time Flute increases the player's Dungeon Timer. == Details == Time Flute increases the player's Dungeon Timer by a base 2%. The Base effect is multiplied by the players Achievement Bonus, to a current maximum of 18%, with an achievement bonus of 800%. Costs a variable amount of Grass, Psychic, and Water Gems when active, cost based on how many total Flutes are active. == Acquisition == ===Shops=== {{ItemPrice/headâ€Ž|Battle items}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops#Undella_Town_Gem_Master|Undella Town Gem Master]]| 10,000 [[File:Grass_Gem.png|30px]]
